Description.Name: Ben Jäger
Description.Details: Ben Jager, a man both distant and haunted, callsign "Monster". A recluse amid rusting relics, he seems to have an unusual kinship with the colossal machines. Withdrawn from normal social interactions, but driven by a deep-seated love for BattleMechs, he has ventured into many interstellar conflicts. Although his motivations are still unknown, his moniker, "Monster", became a haunting emblem on the battlefield.
